description: Jim Bentley is sunning himself while pool boy John Rocklin cleans.  Jim convinces John to take a break and to get into the pool with him.  After the swim, Jim tries to get John to relax but he is nervous about his boss being on the property.  Jim gets him to loosen up with beverage and giving him head.  While Jim is fucking John his boss Eric Manchester walks up to the pool.  So now it is a three way until the other maintenance worker Dane Ford sees them.
title: Giant Splash Shots II
